column5: Sihanoukville International authorities deported 11 more Chinese nationals from the Preah Sihanouk on a notice issued on July 27
column6: 2019 in connection with the illegal use of drugs.------They too are barred from re-entering for 3 years. Yesterday------ 7 Chinese------ were deported
column7: ------13 on Thursday------*It is believed that they were detained following a------ drugs raid on the Obama ------Club. Source: General Department of Immigration
